elements.name: User could register successfully with valid data

steps.name: User navigate to register page
Guest user should be directed to registering page
User select gender
Insert valid Firstname
Insert valid Lastname
Enter his birthday
Enter his birthmonth
Enter his birthyear
Enter valid email
Enter any company name
Enter valid password
Confirm recently entered password
Click register button
the user should be registered successfully
a success green message is displayed

name: User could register to the system successfully

elements.name: User could log in with valid email and password

steps.name: User navigates to Login page
Insert enter valid email
Insert valid password
Click on login button
The user should be logged in successfully

name: Log in to the system successfully

steps.name: User navigates to Login page

elements.name: User could reset his/her password successfully

steps.name: User clicks on forget password button
User navigates to password recovery page
User enters the email he wants to reset the passowrd at
User clicks on recover button

User heads to Apparel category page
